value_i18n.ar_SA: The Liferay Industry Solution Partner of the Year award recognizes partners who are dedicated to driving innovative solutions for specific industries and verticals, such as innovation in the banking industry. Winners of this award are partners who have shown success in industry problem solving and expanding the digital experience footprint across the industry.

Winners of this award are partners who have shown success in industry problem solving and expanding the digital experience footprint across the industry.

value_i18n.ar_SA:
Submission Guidelines

  • To be considered, Industry Solution Partner of the Year nominations must demonstrate
    • Growth in end customer incremental annual recurring revenue (ARR) or contribution of Liferay net new logos
    • Details of industries and departments where solutions apply, with at least three referenceable customer examples
    • Customer impact measures such as cost savings or increased digital interaction, as well as other key success indicators of impact/ROI such as incremental revenues generated, etc.
  •  Responses must be written in English.
  • One submission per vertical industry.
  • Awards cover services and solutions implemented January 1, 2023 through December 1, 2023. 
  • All questions in the application must be complete and include current contact information for the partner contact.
  • To be considered, partners need to be compliant under the Liferay Solution Partner Program Guidelines as outlined in the Program Guide. 
  • We recommend partners use as much content as possible to deliver a comprehensive, complete picture of their relevant customer success. 
  •  Winners are determined by a decision committee of Liferay executive and channel director stakeholders. 
  •  The entry submission deadline is Friday, January 19, 2024 at 11:59 PM PST. No exceptions. 
  • Please direct any questions to partner-marketing@liferay.com.
